channel.title: The Fall of the House of Usher on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Fall of the House of Usher on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mark Hamill: “I Never Wanted to Be Tom Cruise”
item.description: After decades of being pigeon-holed, the 73-year-old is enjoying a career renaissance as a gritty character actor. Hamill talks about his new thriller ‘The Long Walk,’ his feuding with the MAGA “cult”
